DOC.brief_summary: This 4-week study examine effect new experimental medication woman breast cancer establish bone metastasis . This study enroll approximately 45 woman .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Examine Effects Experimental Drug Women With Breast Cancer Metastatic Bone Disease ( MBD ) ( 0822-016 ) ( COMPLETED )
DOC.criteria: Patient histologically cytologicallyconfirmed breast cancer Patient document skeletal metastasis Patient undergo current oral bisphosphonate therapy , history oral bisphosphonate use within 6 month entry study
